name: agentos
description: Self-hosted, local-first AI-powered Desktop CRM with workflow automation. Integrates LLM, CRM, Analytics, and n8n workflows in a single desktop app.
author: Roberto

scripts.lint: cd server && yarn lint && cd ../frontend && yarn lint && cd ../collector && yarn lint
scripts.setup: cd server && yarn && cd ../collector && yarn && cd ../frontend && yarn && cd .. && yarn setup:envs && yarn prisma:setup && echo "Please run yarn dev:server, yarn dev:collector, and yarn dev:frontend in separate terminal tabs."
scripts.setup:envs:
cp -n ./frontend/.env.example ./frontend/.env && cp -n ./server/.env.example ./server/.env.development && cp -n ./collector/.env.example ./collector/.env && cp -n ./docker/.env.example ./docker/.env && echo "All ENV files copied!
"
scripts.dev:desktop: npx concurrently "yarn dev:server" "yarn dev:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd electron && yarn dev"
scripts.build:desktop: cd frontend && yarn build && cd ../electron && yarn build:mac
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.prisma:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:setup: yarn prisma:generate && yarn prisma:migrate && yarn prisma:seed
scripts.normalize:translations: cd frontend/src/locales && node normalizeEn.mjs && cd ../../.. && cd frontend && yarn lint && cd .. && yarn verify:translations
